mainSubscribersBenefits.title: Your support enables 500 new free donations every month

subscribeBundlePage.benefitTitleUnique: See the benefits of one-time donation
subscribeBundlePage.benefitText: Excluding transfer fees, 100% of this amount will be allocated to the institutions available on Ribon.
subscribeBundlePage.subscriptionModalBody: Take the next step and help even more buying ribons to donate
subscribeBundlePage.firstSubscriptionFaqQuestion: Why should I support free donations?
subscribeBundlePage.firstSubscriptionFaqAnswer: Ribon only works because our supporters pay for the free donations. It is thanks to them that thousands of people can feel what is it like to do real good everyday without having to spend money.
subscribeBundlePage.secondSubscriptionFaqQuestion: How will my money be used?
subscribeBundlePage.secondSubscriptionFaqAnswer: After discounting transfer fees, the amount will be used to pay for free donations, with 100% going to the social causes in our app
subscribeBundlePage.thirdSubscriptionFaqQuestion: How will I receive my donation packages?
subscribeBundlePage.thirdSubscriptionFaqAnswer: You'll receive your packages weekly. The first donation package will arrive when you subscribe, the next in the following week, and so on.
subscribeBundlePage.fourthSubscriptionFaqQuestion: How do I change my credit card number?
subscribeBundlePage.fourthSubscriptionFaqAnswer: Currently it's not possible to change your card number in a subscription. Therefore, in this case, you must make a new subscription using the card of your choice and cancel the old subscription.
subscribeBundlePage.fifthSubscriptionFaqQuestion: How can I cancel my subscription?
subscribeBundlePage.fifthSubscriptionFaqAnswer: Cancelling your subscription is fairly simple and can be done any time on the profile page. You only need to access your configurations, go to 'Manage subscriptions', select the subscription that you want to cancel and click on 'Cancel Subscription'.
subscribeBundlePage.firstUniqueDonationFaqQuestion: Why should I support free donations?
subscribeBundlePage.firstUniqueDonationFaqAnswer: Ribon only works because our supporters pay for the free donations. It is thanks to them that thousands of people can feel what is it like to do real good everyday without having to spend money.
subscribeBundlePage.secondUniqueDonationFaqQuestion: How will my money be used?
subscribeBundlePage.secondUniqueDonationFaqAnswer: After discounting transfer fees, the amount will be used to pay for free donations, with 100% going to the social causes in our app
subscribeBundlePage.thirdUniqueDonationFaqQuestion: How will I receive my ribons?
subscribeBundlePage.thirdUniqueDonationFaqAnswer: You'll receive your ribons in the moment of your purchase.
subscribeBundlePage.supportFreeDonors: Be a supporter and enable others to donate for free!

privacyPolicyPage.headerText: Privacy Policy and Retention of Personal Data
privacyPolicyPage.termsText: At Ribon, privacy and security are priorities and we are committed to the transparency of the processing of personal data of our users/customers. Therefore, our Privacy Policy establishes how the collection, use and transfer of information from customers or other people who access or use our platform is carried out.
privacyPolicyPage.termText: By using our services, you understand that we will collect and use Data Protection rules (LGPD, Federal Law 13.709/2018), the consumer provisions of Federal Law 8078/1990 and other applicable rules of the Brazilian legal system.
privacyPolicyPage.tText: Access our Privacy and Personal Data Retention Policy here for your full reading.
privacyPolicyPage.text: By using Ribon, you consent to the processing of personal data in the ways indicated by our Privacy Policy and Retention of Personal Data.
